data.partBlankContent: Harriet was a healthy, good-looking girl, and she was very friendly. Everyone wan___ to d_ things wi__ her, and s__ got ph___ calls a__ day lo__. But si___ she w__ shy, she mos___ just sta___ home a__ the ti__. She did chat a lot online, though.
data.answer: 哈丽特是一个健康、漂亮的女孩，她很友好。每个人都想和她一起做事，她整天都在接电话。但由于她很害羞，她大部分时间都呆在家里。不过她倒是经常在网上聊天。
